sig_info: At the beginning of the fight, and whenever Flash loses 50% of his Max Health, he temporarily loses control of the Venom symbiote, increasing Attack by 6.64 to 26.53. This effect is lost once he is struck 5 times.
While under Klyntar Rage, Flash also gains 26.02 to 109.29 Critical Damage Rating.

PASSIVE: Flash’s intense military background, coupled with the alien symbiotic enhancement, grants him a 70% chance to Purify any Debuff.
The Venom Symbiote works with Flash’s training to reduce enemy Evasion chance by 50%.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: 65% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 182.6 Direct Damage over 4 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: This attack reduces enemy Evasion chance by 30%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: This attack Incinerates the enemy, dealing 83 Energy Damage over 8.50 seconds. This effect also removes Perfect Block Chance and reduces Block Proficiency by 50% while it's active.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Any Bleed effect has an additional 25% chance to trigger.
